unnormalised: Hey guys, regarding pesticide usage, isn't it a bit much sometimes? I remember my grandfather in Kerala used traditional methods only. Now everyone's spraying like it's Diwali! 10/02/2023, my neighbour used so much on his paddy, smelled awful near my house at 17:00 hrs. Maybe Krishi Vigyan Kendra can run awareness drives? Less poison, more produce! Think of the environment and our future generations, like my lil' Rohan! 26/01/2024 is Republic Day, let's pledge for safer farming.
